mn136:2.7: mā hevaṃ, āvuso potaliputta, avaca → idaṃ vākyaṃ sya-all, km potthakesu
mn136:2.9: Atthi ca kho → atthi ceva kho (mr)
mn136:2.12: nāma evaṃnavo bhikkhu → nāmevaṃ navo bhikkhu (bj); navakena bhikkhunā (mr)
mn136:6.5: ummaṅgaṃ → ummaggaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed); umaṅgaṃ (mr)
mn136:6.13: byākaramāno → idaṃ padaṃ bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed potthakesu
mn136:9.8: micchā tesaṃ ñāṇan’ti → micchā te sañjānanti (mr)
